Instruction: Wash the radishes and trim off the tops and roots. Thinly slice the radishes.
Peel and thinly slice the cucumber. Thinly slice the red onion.
In a large bowl, combine the sliced radishes, cucumber, red onion, and chopped fresh dill.
In a small bowl, mix together Greek yogurt, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Refrigerate the salad for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish.
